categori ii (nation park) sand dune death valley nation park death valley locat california nevada, us nearest&#160;c lone pine, california; beatty, nevada coordin 36°14′31″n 116°49′33″w﻿ / ﻿36.24194°n 116.82583°w﻿ / 36.24194; -116.82583coordinates: 36°14′31″n 116°49′33″w﻿ / ﻿36.24194°n 116.82583°w﻿ / 36.24194; -116.82583 area 3,373,063 acr (5,270.411&#160;sq&#160;mi; 1,365,030&#160;ha; 13,650.30&#160;km2)[1] establish feb. 11, 1933 (monument) oct. 31, 1994 (nation park)[2] visitor 1,101,312 (in&#160;2014)[3] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic death valley nation park nation park u.s. state california nevada locat east sierra nevada, occupi interfac zone arid great basin mojav desert unit states. park protect northwest corner mojav desert contain divers desert environ salt-flats, sand dunes, badlands, valleys, canyons, mountains. largest nation park lower 48 state declar intern biospher reserve. approxim 95% park design wilder area.[4] hottest driest nation park unit states. second-lowest point western hemispher badwat basin, 282 feet (86&#160;m) sea level. park home mani speci plant anim adapt harsh desert environment. exampl includ creosot bush, bighorn sheep, coyote, death valley pupfish, survivor much wetter times. seri nativ american group inhabit area earli 7000&#160;bc, recent timbisha around 1000&#160;ad migrat winter camp valley summer ground mountains. group european-american becam stuck valley 1849 look shortcut gold field california gave valley name, even though one group die there. sever short-liv boom town sprang late 19th earli 20th centuri mine gold silver. long-term profit ore mine borax, transport valley twenty-mul teams. valley later becam subject books, radio programs, televis series, movies. tourism blossom 1920s, resort built around stovepip well furnac creek. death valley nation monument declar 1933 park substanti expand becam nation park 1994.[2] natur environ area shape larg geology. valley actual graben. oldest rock extens metamorphos least 1.7&#160;billion year old.[5] ancient, warm, shallow sea deposit marin sediment rift open pacif ocean. addit sediment occur subduct zone form coast. uplift region sea creat line volcanoes. later crust start pull apart, creat current basin rang landform. valley fill sediment and, wet time glacial periods, lakes, lake manly. 2013, death valley nation park design dark sky park intern dark-ski association.[6] content 1 geograph set 2 climat 3 human histori 3.1 earli inhabit transient popul 3.2 boom bust 3.3 earli tourism 3.4 protect later histori 4 geolog histori 4.1 basement pahrump group 4.2 rift deposit 4.3 compress uplift 4.4 stretch lake 5 biolog 6 activ 7 see also 8 refer 8.1 explanatori note 8.2 citat 8.3 bibliographi 9 extern link geograph setting[edit] two major valley park, death valley panamint valley. valley form within last million year bound north–south-trend mountain ranges.[7] adjac valley follow gener trend basin rang topographi one modification: parallel strike-slip fault perpendicularli bound central extent death valley. result shear action addit extens central part death valley caus slight widen subsid there. uplift surround mountain rang subsid valley floor occurring. uplift black mountain fast alluvi fan (fan-shap deposit mouth canyons) small steep compar huge alluvi fan come panamint range. fast uplift mountain rang arid environ often allow canyon enough time cut classic v-shape way stream bed. instead, v-shape end slot canyon halfway down, form 'wine glass canyon.' sediment deposit small steep alluvi fan. 279 feet (85&#160;m) sea level,[8] badwat basin death valley' floor second-lowest depress western hemispher (behind laguna del carbón argentina), mount whitney, 85 mile (137&#160;km) west, rise 14,505 feet (4,421&#160;m).[7] topograph relief greatest elev gradient contigu unit state terminu point great basin' southwestern drainage.[5] although extrem lack water great basin make distinct littl current practic use, mean wetter time lake fill death valley (lake manly) last stop water flow region, mean water satur dissolv materials. thu salt pan death valley among largest world rich minerals, borax variou salt hydrates.[9] largest salt pan park extend 40 mile (64&#160;km) ashford mill site salt creek hills, cover 200 squar mile (520&#160;km2) valley floor.[9][not 1] best known playa park racetrack, known move rocks. map park show old monument land (light green) expand park land (dark green) racetrack playa, view south edg playa toward grandstand sea level sign seen cliff (circl red) badwat basin, death valley nation park. badwat basin elev sign scenery. desert abandon radiat water tank near grapevin climate[edit] slice highest lowest point death valley nation park death valley hottest driest place north america lack surfac water low relief. frequent hottest spot unit state mani tabul highest daili temperatur countri omit death valley matter course.[10][11] afternoon juli 10, 1913, unit state weather bureau record high temperatur 134&#160;°f (56.7&#160;°c) greenland ranch (now furnac creek) death valley.[12] temperatur stand highest ambient air temperatur ever record surfac earth. (a report temperatur 58&#160;°c (136.4&#160;°f) record libya 1922 later determin inaccurate.)[13] daili summer temperatur 120&#160;°f (49&#160;°c) greater common, well freez nightli temperatur winter.[5] juli hottest month, averag high 115&#160;°f (46&#160;°c) averag low 88&#160;°f (31&#160;°c).[14] decemb coldest month, averag high 65&#160;°f (18&#160;°c) averag low 39&#160;°f (4&#160;°c).[14] record low 15&#160;°f (−9.4&#160;°c).[14] sever larger death valley spring deriv water region aquifer, extend far east southern nevada utah. much water aquif mani thousand years, sinc pleistocen ice ages, climat cooler wetter. today' drier climat provid enough precipit recharg aquif rate water withdrawn.[15] devil' golf cours highest rang within park panamint rang telescop peak highest point 11,049 feet (3,368&#160;m).[5] death valley region transit zone northernmost part mojav desert consist five mountain rang remov pacif ocean. three signific barriers: sierra nevada, argu range, panamint range. air mass tend lose moistur forc mountain ranges, climatologist call rainshadow effect. exagger rainshadow effect death valley area make north america' driest spot, receiv 1.5 inch (38&#160;mm) rainfal annual badwat (some year fail regist measur rainfall).[16] annual averag precipit vari 1.92 inch (49&#160;mm) overal sea level 15 inch (380&#160;mm) higher mountain surround valley.[14] rain arriv often intens storm caus flash flood remodel landscap sometim creat shallow ephemer lakes. lake badwater, spring, 2005 hot, dri climat make difficult soil form. mass wasting, down-slop movement loos rock, therefor domin eros forc mountain area, result "skeletonized" rang (mountain littl soil them). sand dune park, famous, nearli widespread fame dryness area may suggest. mesquit flat dune field easili access pave road east stovepip well north-centr part valley primarili made quartz sand. anoth dune field 10 mile (16&#160;km) north instead mostli compos travertin sand.[17] highest dune park, highest north america, locat eureka valley 50 mile (80&#160;km) north stovepip wells, panamint valley dune salin valley dune locat west northwest town, respectively. ibex dune field near seldom-visit ibex hill southernmost part park, south saratoga spring marshland. latter four dune field access via unpav roads. prevail wind winter come north, prevail wind summer come south. thu overal posit dune field remain less fixed. rare except dri natur area. 2005, unusu wet winter creat 'lake' badwat basin led greatest wildflow season park' history.[18] octob 2015, "1000 year flood event" three inch rain caus major damag death valley nation park.[19] climat data death valley (furnac creek station) month jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec year record high http://www.wrcc.dri.edu [22] human history[edit] petroglyph mesquit spring earli inhabit transient populations[edit] four nativ american cultur known live area last 10,000&#160;years.[5] first known group, nevar spring people, hunter gather arriv area perhap 9,000&#160;year ago (7000&#160;bc) still small lake death valley neighbor panamint valley.[23] much milder climat persist time, larg game anim still plentiful. 5,000&#160;year ago (3000&#160;bc) mesquit flat peopl displac nevar spring people.[23] around 2,000&#160;year ago saratoga spring peopl move area, probabl alreadi hot, dri desert.[23][not 2] cultur advanc hunt gather skill handcrafts. also left mysteri stone pattern valley. one-thousand year ago, nomad timbisha (formerli call shoshon also known panamint koso) move area hunt game gather mesquit bean along pinyon pine nuts.[5][23] wide altitud differenti valley bottom mountain ridges, especi west, timbisha practic vertic migrat pattern.[5] winter camp locat near water sourc valley bottoms. spring summer progress weather warmed, grass plant food sourc ripen progress higher altitudes. novemb found top mountain ridg harvest pine nut move back valley bottom winter. california gold rush brought first peopl european descent known visit immedi area. decemb 1849 two group california gold country-bound white travel perhap 100 wagon total stumbl death valley get lost thought shortcut old spanish trail.[24] call bennett-arcan party, unabl find pass valley weeks; abl find fresh water variou spring area, forc eat sever oxen survive. use wood wagon cook meat make jerky. place today refer "burn wagon camp" locat near sand dunes. abandon wagons, eventu abl hike valley. leav valley, one women group turn said, "goodby death valley," give valley endur name.[24][not 3] includ parti william lewi manli whose autobiograph book death valley '49 detail trek popular area (geologist later name prehistor lake fill valley him). twenty-mul team death valley histor locomot borax-carri death valley (furnace-creek-museum), usa, june 1993 skidoo 1906 scotty' castl construct civilian conserv corp worker death valley twenty-mul team canyon, death valley boom bust[edit] ore famous associ area also easiest collect profitable: evaporit deposit salts, borate, talc. borax found rosi aaron winter near furnac creek ranch (then call greenland) 1881.[25] later year, eagl borax work becam death valley' first commerci borax operation. william tell coleman built harmoni borax work plant began process ore late 1883 earli 1884, continu 1888.[26] mine smelt compani produc borax make soap industri uses.[27] end product ship valley 165 mile (266&#160;km) mojav railhead 10-ton-capac wagon pull "twenty-mul teams" actual team 18 mule two hors each.[27] team averag two mile (3&#160;km) hour requir 30&#160;day complet round trip.[25] trade name 20-mule team borax establish franci marion smith' pacif coast borax compani smith acquir coleman' borax hold 1890. memor advertis campaign use wagon' imag promot boraxo brand granular hand soap death valley day radio televis programs. 1914, death valley railroad built serv mine oper east side valley. mine continu collaps coleman' empire, late 1920 area world' number one sourc borax.[5] four six million year old, furnac creek format primari sourc borat miner gather death valley' playas.[25] visitor stay prospect mine deposit copper, gold, lead, silver.[5] sporad mine ventur hamper remot locat harsh desert environment. decemb 1903, two men ballarat prospect silver.[28] one out-of-work irish miner name jack kean one-ey basqu butcher name domingo etcharren. quit accident, kean discov immens ledg free-mil gold duo' work site name claim kean wonder mine. start minor short-liv gold rush area.[28] kean wonder mine, along mine rhyolite, skidoo harrisburg, one extract enough metal ore make worthwhile. outright sham leadfield also occurred, ventur quickli end short seri prospect mine fail yield evid signific ore (these mine dot entir area signific hazard anyon enter them). boom town sprang around mine flourish 1900 (decade) soon declin panic 1907.[26] earli tourism[edit] first document tourist facil death valley set tent hous built 1920 stovepip well located. peopl flock resort built around natur spring thought cur restor properties. 1927, pacif coast borax turn crew quarter furnac creek ranch resort, creat furnac creek inn resort.[29] spring furnac creek har develop resort, water diverted, surround marsh wetland start shrink.[15] soon valley popular winter destination. facil start privat getaway later open public. notabl among death valley ranch, better known scotty' castle. larg ranch home built spanish reviv style becam hotel late 1930 and, larg fame death valley scotty, tourist attraction. death valley scotty, whose real name walter scott, gold miner pretend owner "hi castle", claim built profit gold mine. neither claim true, real owner, chicago millionair albert mussey johnson, encourag myth. ask report connect walter scott' castle, johnson repli mr. scott' banker.[30] protect later history[edit] presid herbert hoover proclaim nation monument around death valley februari 11, 1933, set asid almost two million acr (8,000&#160;km2) southeastern california small part southwesternmost nevada.[31] twelv compani work death valley use civilian conserv corp worker great depress earli 1940s. built barracks, grade 500 mile (800&#160;km) roads, instal water telephon lines, erect total 76 buildings.[32] trail panamint rang built point scenic interest, adob village, laundri trade post construct shoshon indians. five campgrounds, restrooms, airplan land field picnic facil also built. creation monument result temporari close land prospect mining. however, death valley quickli reopen mine congression action june year. improv mine technolog allow lower grade ore processed, new heavi equip allow greater amount rock moved, mine death valley changed. gone day "single-blanket, jackass prospector" long associ romant west. open pit strip mine scar landscap intern mine corpor bought claim highli visibl area nation monument. public outcri ensu led greater protect nation park monument area unit states. abandon mine shaft leadfield 1976, congress pass mine park act, close death valley nation monument file new mine claims, ban open-pit mine requir nation park servic examin valid ten thousand pre-1976 mine claims.[26] mine allow resum limit basi 1980 stricter environment standards.[26] park' resourc manag divis monitor mine within park boundari continu review statu 125 unpat mine claim 19 patent claim groups, ensur feder guidelin follow park' resourc protected. 2005, billi mine, underground borax mine locat along road dante' view, closed, end mine park. death valley nation monument design biospher reserv 1984.[2] octob 31, 1994, monument expand 1.3 million acr (5,300&#160;km2) re-design nation park, via congression passag california desert protect act (public law 103-433).[2] consequently, elev statu death valley made largest nation park contigu unit states. mani larger citi town within boundari region ground water flow system park plant anim reli upon experienc fastest growth rate place unit states. notabl exampl within 100-mile (160&#160;km) radiu death valley nation park includ la vega pahrump, nevada. case la vegas, local chamber commerc estim 6,000 peopl move citi everi month. 1985 1995, popul la vega valley increas 550,700 1,138,800.[15] telescop wildros peak emigr canyon rd. 1977, part death valley use director georg luca film locat star wars, provid set fiction planet tatooine.[33][34] geolog history[edit] era rock units/form princip geolog event cenozo alluvi fans, stream, playa deposits, dunes, numer sedimentary, volcanic, pluton unit separ interconnect basin igneou field (includ artist drive, furnac creek, funeral, nova formations). major uncoformity, continu deposit modern death valley, open modern death valley, continu develop present rang basins, onset major extension. mesozo granit plutons, butt valley thrust fault intrus pluton relat sierra nevada batholith; shallow marin deposition; unconformity. paleozo rest spring shale, tin mountain limestone, lost burro, hidden valley dolomite, eureka quarzite, nopah, bonanza king, carrara, zabriski quartzite, wood canyon. develop long-continu carbon bank passiv continent margin; numer interv emergence, interrupt deposit blanket sandston middl ordovician time. deposit wedg silliciclast sediment immedi follow rift along new continent margin. prototerozo crystallin basement, pahrump, stirl quartzite, johnnie, ibex, noonday dolomite, kingston peak, beck spring, crystal spring. region metamorphism, major unconformity, rapid uplift erosion, shallow marin deposition, glacio-marin deposition, unconformity. shallow deep marin deposit along incipi continent margin. deep death valley basin fill sediment (light yellow) erod surround mountains. black line show major fault creat valley. main article: geolog death valley area park divers complex geolog history. sinc formation, area compris park experienc least four major period extens volcanism, three four period major sedimentation, sever interv major tecton deform crust reshaped. two period glaciat (a seri ice ages) also effect area, although glacier ever exist rang park. basement pahrump group[edit] littl known histori oldest expos rock area due extens metamorph (alter rock heat pressure). radiometr date give age 1,700&#160;million year metamorph proterozoic.[5] 1,400&#160;million year ago mass granit panamint rang intrud complex.[35] uplift later expos rock nearli 500&#160;million year erosion.[35] proterozo sedimentari format pahrump group deposit basement rocks. occur follow uplift eros earlier sediment proterozo basement rocks. pahrump compos arkos conglomer (quartz clast concrete-lik matrix) mudston lower part, follow dolomit carbon bank top algal mat stromatolites, finish basin-fil sediment deriv above, includ possibl glacial till hypothes snowbal earth glaciation.[36] youngest rock pahrump group basalt lava flows. noonday dolomit form carbon shelf break-up rodinia. rift deposition[edit] rift open subsequ flood region part breakup supercontin rodinia neoproterozo (bi 755&#160;million year ago) creation pacif ocean. shorelin similar present atlant ocean margin unit state lay east. algal mat-cov carbon bank deposited, form noonday dolomite.[37] subsid region occur continent crust thin newli form pacif widened, form ibex formation. angular unconform (an uneven gap geolog record) followed. true ocean basin develop west, break earlier format along steep front. wedg clastic sediment began accumul base two underwat precipices, start format oppos continent shelfs.[38] three format develop sediment accumul wedge. region' first known fossil complex life found result formations.[38] notabl among ediacara fauna trilobites, evolut latter part cambrian explos life. sandi mudflat gave way 550&#160;million year ago carbon platform (similar one around present-day bahamas), last next 300&#160;million&#160;year paleozo time (refer middl timescal image). death valley' posit within ten twenti degre paleozo equator. thick bed carbonate-rich sediment period interrupt period emergence. although detail geographi vari immens interv time, north-northeasterli trend coastlin gener ran arizona utah. result eight format one group 20,000 feet (6&#160;km) thick underlay much cottonwood, funeral, grapevine, panamint ranges.[38] compress uplift[edit] early-to-mid- mesozo western edg north american contin push ocean plate pacif ocean, creat subduct zone.[38] subduct zone type contact differ crustal plate heavier crust slide lighter crust. erupt volcano uplift mountain creat result, coastlin push west. sierran arc start form northwest heat pressur gener subduction, compress forc caus thrust fault develop. long period uplift eros concurr follow events, creat major unconformity, larg gap geolog record. sediment worn death valley region carri east west wind water.[39] jurassic- eocene-ag sedimentari format exist area, except possibl jurassic-ag volcan rock (see top timescal image).[39] lake manli lake system might look last maximum extent 22,000&#160;year ago[40] (usg image) wet periods, amargosa river flow surface, death valley wet winter 2005. wildflow also peak wetter years. eros mani million year creat rel featureless plain. thirty-f million year ago, sluggish stream migrat later surface. sever similar format also laid down. stretch lakes[edit] basin range-associ stretch larg part crust southwestern unit state northwestern mexico start around 16&#160;million&#160;year ago region still spreading.[5] stretch began affect death panamint valley area 3&#160;million year ago.[41] this, rock panamint rang top rock would becom black mountain cottonwood mountains. later vertic transport block accomplish movement normal faults. right-later movement along strike-slip fault run parallel base rang also help develop area.[42] torsion forces, probabl associ northwesterli movement pacif plate along san andrea fault (west region), respons later movement.[41] igneou activ associ stretch occur 12&#160;million 4&#160;million year ago.[42] sediment concentr valley (basins) materi erod adjac ranges. amount sediment deposit roughli kept subsidence, result retent less valley floor elev time. pleistocen ice age start 2&#160;million year ago, melt alpin glacier nearbi sierra nevada mountain fed seri lake fill death panamint valley surround basin (see top timescal image). lake fill death valley last chain lake fed amargosa mojav rivers, possibl also owen river. larg lake cover much death valley' floor, geologist call lake manly, start dri 10,500&#160;year ago.[43] saltpan playa creat ice age glacier retreated, thu drastic reduc lakes' water source. faint shorelin left. biology[edit] habitat vari saltpan 282 feet (86&#160;m) sea level sub-alpin condit found summit telescop peak, rise 11,049 feet (3,368&#160;m).[44] veget zone includ creosot bush, desert holly, mesquit lower elev sage shadscale, blackbrush, joshua tree, pinyon-juniper, limber pine bristlecon pine woodlands.[44] saltpan devoid vegetation, rest valley floor lower slope spars cover, although water available, abund veget usual present. zone adjac desert support varieti wildlif species, includ 51 speci nativ mammals, 307 speci birds, 36 speci reptiles, 3 speci amphibians, 2 speci nativ fish.[45] small mammal numer larg mammals, bighorn sheep, coyot (image), bobcats, kit foxes, cougars, mule deer.[45] mule deer present pinyon/junip associ grapevine, cottonwood, panamint ranges.[45] bighorn sheep rare speci mountain sheep exist isol band sierra death valley. highli adapt anim eat almost plant. known predators, human burro compet habitat. death valley pupfish spawn salt creek ancestor death valley pupfish swam area colorado river via long-sinc dried-up system river lake (see lake manly). live two separ populations: one salt creek anoth cottonbal marsh. death valley one hottest driest place north america, yet home 1,000 speci plants; 23 which, includ rare rock ladi (holmgrenanth petrophila), found anywher else.[44] adapt dri environ key. example, creosot bush mesquit tap-root system extend 50 feet (15&#160;m) order take advantag year-round suppli ground water. divers death valley' plant commun result partli region' locat transit zone mojav desert, great basin desert sonoran desert. location, combin great relief found within park, support veget typic three biotic life zones: lower sonoran, canadian, arctic/alpin portion panamint range. base munz keck (1968) classifications, seven plant commun categor within life zones, character domin veget repres three veget types: scrub, desert woodland, conifer forest. microhabitat subdivid commun zones, especi valley floor. sphinx moth rock nettl mosaic canyon unlik typic locat across mojav desert, mani water-depend death valley habitat possess divers plant anim speci found anywher els world.[15] exist speci due larg uniqu geolog histori process evolut progress habitat isol one anoth sinc pleistocen epoch. activities[edit] see also: place interest death valley area sightse avail person automobile, four-wheel drive, bicycle, mountain bike (on establish roadway only), hiking. ride park motorcycl also popular pastime.[46] state rout 190, badwat road, scotty' castl road, pave road dante' view wildros provid access major scenic viewpoint histor point interest. 350 mile (560&#160;km) unpav four-wheel-dr road provid access wilder hiking, camping, histor sites.[47] vehicl must licens street legal. hike trail vari length difficulties, backcountri area access cross-countri hiking. liter thousand hike possibilities. normal season visit park octob 15 may 15, summer extrem temperature. costum live histori tour histor death valley scotty' castl conduct fee, octob 2015, suspend due flood damag scotty' castl build grounds.[48] tourist slide star dune mesquit flat dune field nine design campground within park, overnight backcountri camp permit avail visitor center.[49] xanterra park &amp; resort own oper privat resort, furnac creek inn ranch resort,[31] compris two separ distinct hotels: furnac creek inn four-star histor hotel, furnac creek ranch three-star ranch-styl properti reminisc mine prospect days. death valley lodg compani oper stovepip well villag motel. stovepip well villag author concess oper locat death valley nation park. motel near variou entranc park, shoshone, death valley junction, beatty, nevada, panamint springs. visitor center locat furnac creek resort area state rout 190. 12-minut introductori slide program shown everi 30&#160;minutes.[50] winter season—novemb april—rang offer interpret tour wide varieti walks, talks, slide present death valley cultur natur history. visitor center display deal park' geology, climate, wildlif natur history. also specif section deal human histori pioneer experience. death valley natur histori associ maintain bookstor specif gear natur cultur histori park. death valley nation park popular locat stargaz one darkest night sky unit states. despit death valley' remot location, air qualiti night visibl threaten civilization. particular, light pollut introduc nearbi la vegas.[51] darkest sky are, general, locat northwest park.[52] 360-degre panorama racetrack playa night. milki way visibl arc center. see also[edit] list nation protect area unit state mojav colorado desert biospher reserv nation regist histor place list death valley nation park references[edit] explanatori notes[edit] ^ badwater, devil golf course, salt creek part death valley saltpan. ^ last known lake exist death valley like dri 3,000&#160;year ago. ^ fact one member death valley '49er die death valley, elderli man name culverwell, half dead
